Key Match Events: Brandon Miller scored 19 points by rebounding Grant Williams’ missed 3-pointer and scoring just in time at the buzzer.
LaMelo Ball scored five of his 25 points in the final minute.
Ronald Holland II’s steal and basket in the final 10 seconds put the Pistons in position to win before Charlotte’s time-out.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Charlotte Hornets forward Brandon Miller (24) and guard LaMelo Ball (1) high five after a dunk and assist during the second half.
Miles Bridges pumped in 27 points and LaMelo Ball scored five of his 25 points in the final minute to help the Hornets end a three-game losing streak.
Jaden Ivey’s 21 points and Cade Cunningham’s triple-double of 20 points, 10 rebounds and 10 assists led the Pistons.
Tobias Harris added 14 points and Tim Hardaway Jr. and reserve Paul Reed supplied 13 points apiece.
Charlotte made all 16 of their free throw attempts during the game, while the Pistons were 5-for-9 at the foul line.
